text: Alexandria is a city in Virginia in the United States. It has a population of 159,200 in 2020. It is 6 miles south of Washington, D.C. It is by the Potomac River. The temperature is between 80째F to 100째F in the summer, and 20째F to 40째F in the winter. The city is twinned with Caen in France, Dundee in Scotland and Gyumri in Armenia. == References ==
title: Alexandria, Virginia
